title: Verify: Selecting TheBlaze TV Channel successfully opens TheBlaze
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Roku device
AND has gone to the "Channel Store"
AND has added "TheBlaze TV"
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "TheBlaze TV" Channel from the Roku menu
custom_expected: THEN "TheBlaze TV" will open successfully

title: First Time Access: Verify that the first time TheBlaze TV Channel is accessed, the user does not receive an existing subscriber access gate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed TheBlaze
AND has not accessed the channel yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the channel for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not receive a 'Are you already a subscriber?' message
AND the user should be brought to the appropriate landing page

title: Verify: 'Subscribe Now' Promotional item does not appear for logged in user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previous installed TheBlaze
AND has already linked their installation to their account
AND the user's account is valid
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Channel
custom_expected: THEN the user will not receive any notification regarding subscribing to TheBlaze

title: ***Verify: Configured Promotion image displays for non logged in user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed TheBlaze
AND has not already linked their installation to their account
AND a promotional image has been configured
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses TheBlaze
custom_expected:
THEN a promotional image will appear
AND the user will be able to dismiss this message according

title: Verify: TheBlaze can be accessed while the Roku is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Roku device
AND the Roku device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND "TheBlaze TV" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "TheBlaze TV" Channel from the Roku menu
custom_expected: THEN "TheBlaze TV" will open successfully

title: Verify: TheBlaze can be accessed while the Roku is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Roku device
AND the Roku device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND "TheBlaze TV" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "TheBlaze TV" Channel from the Roku menu
custom_expected: THEN "TheBlaze TV" will open successfully

title: Verify: Menu options for TheBlaze when accessed by a registered user (Logged In)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are logged in using TheBlaze TV account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed:
> LIVE NOW: (live media option)
> All Shows
> TheBlaze Radio
> Featured Clips
> Logout

title: Verify: Menu options for TheBlaze when accessed by an unregistered user (NOT Logged In)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are not logged in to a TheBlaze TV account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed:
> Featured Clips
> LIVE NOW: (live media option)
> All Shows
> TheBlaze Radio
> Log In
> Subscribe Now

title: ***Verify: Menu options for TheBlaze when accessed by an unentitled user (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are not logged in to a TheBlaze TV account
AND we are linked to a Free TheBlaze account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed:
> Featured Clips
> LIVE NOW: (live media option)
> All Shows
> Search
> TheBlaze Radio
> Log Out
> Subscribe Now

title: Verify: Landing page can be configured with a full bleed image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND a full bleed image is set as the Landing Page background image
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu
custom_expected:
THEN the image will display clearly
AND the menu items will display without issue

title: Verify: Landing page can be configured with a partial right hand side screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND a partial right hand side screen is set as the Landing Page background image
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu
custom_expected:
THEN the image will display clearly
AND the menu items will display without issue

title: Verify: LIVE NOW broadcast listing updates accordingly
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
custom_steps:
WHEN we go to the Main Menu
AND the LIVE media has changed while the user has been inside TheBlaze Channel
custom_expected:
THEN the LIVE NOW listing will properly reflect the current LIVE media
AND this will conform with the expected refresh rate

title: Verify: LIVE NOW listing properly reflects current live TV Broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND is on the main menu
custom_steps: WHEN the LIVE NOW option is displayed
custom_expected: THEN the LIVE NOW show will properly reflect the title of the show that is currently Live

title: Verify: Selecting the LIVE NOW option brings an entitled user directly to the Live video feed (Blaze TV entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND there is a live broadcast available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to the main menu
AND accesses the LIVE NOW listing that displays
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought directly to the live video
AND the user will not be brought to the Show Detail page
AND the video stream will play successfully

title: Verify: Selecting the LIVE NOW option brings up the paywall message for an unentitled user (not logged in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND there is a live broadcast available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to the main menu
AND accesses the LIVE NOW listing that displays
custom_expected: THEN the user will be presented with a paywall message

title: Verify: Selecting the LIVE NOW option brings up the paywall message for an unentitled user (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with FREE (unentitled) TheBlaze TV account
AND there is a live broadcast available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to the main menu
AND accesses the LIVE NOW listing that displays
custom_expected: THEN the user will be presented with a paywall message

title: Verify: Featured Clips option defaults for unregistered user when menu is accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has not linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the main menu/landing page
custom_expected: THEN the Featured Clips option will be highlighted by default when the page is accessed

title: Verify: If an entitled user accesses the menu and there is no Live Feed available, the LIVE NOW listing will be hidden
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND there is currently no live video feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the main menu/landing page
custom_expected: THEN the LIVE NOW option will not be present in the menu options

title: Verify: If an unentitled user accesses the menu and there is no Live Feed available, the LIVE NOW listing will be hidden
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND there is currently no live video feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the main menu/landing page
custom_expected: THEN the LIVE NOW option will not be present in the menu options

title: Verify: Data refreshes every 5 minutes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has access TheBlaze
AND there is new data being posted
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Landing page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the data update according
AND this will update in intervals of 5 minutes
> New LIVE NOW option, etc

title: Verify: Hero/Landing Page image does not update/change each time the user navigates through menu items on left hand side
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are on the main menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the different menu options
AND we highlight the different options on the left hand side
custom_expected: THEN the background will not change each time a different menu option is highlighted

title: Verify: Menu list does not display Bullets
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
custom_steps: WHEN we view the Main Menu
custom_expected: THEN the menu list will not include Bullet points to the left of the menu items

title: Verify: Log Out and Log In options change based on user's current link status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are logged in using TheBlaze TV account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the Main Menu will show an option to Log Out
AND if we select this the option will be replaced with Log In

title: Verify: Selecting Featured Clips from main menu opens page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are on the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we select Featured Clips from the menu options
custom_expected: THEN the Featured Clips page will open accordingly

title: Featured: Verify that when the Video Thumbnails appear that they correspond to that particular Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Featured Clips section from the Home Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Videos
custom_expected:
THEN the Video Thumbnails that appear correspond to the Video that they are attached to
AND the titles/metadata will match according

title: Featured: Verify user can scroll to view additional clip listings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected Featured Clips from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the What's New row
AND they navigate to the right
AND they navigate to the left
custom_expected:
THEN the clip list will swipe accordingly
AND the additional thumbnails will display

title: Featured: Verify Show Title / Metadata displays for all thumbnails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected Featured Clips from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user browses through the thumbnails
custom_expected:
THEN below each thumbnail will display the Title
AND the metadata will be formatted correctly

title: Featured: Verify clicking on Thumbnail launches video
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to the Featured Clips section
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight a featured clip thumbnail
AND select it
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding video clip will launch accordingly

title: Featured: Verify user is able to successfully play a video clip while connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Roku device is connected using a wireless network connection
AND we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to the Featured Clips section
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight a featured clip thumbnail
AND select it
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding video clip will launch accordingly

title: Featured: Verify user is able to successfully play a video clip while connected with a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Roku device is connected using a wired network connection
AND we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to the Featured Clips section
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight a featured clip thumbnail
AND select it
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding video clip will launch accordingly

title: Featured: Verify an entitled user can play Featured Clip streams successfully (Blaze TV entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected Featured Clips from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight a featured clip thumbnail
AND select it
custom_expected: THEN the Featured video clip launches and plays successfully

title: Featured: Verify an unentitled user can play Featured Clip streams successfully (not logged in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected Featured Clips from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight a featured clip thumbnail
AND we select it
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not receive a paywall
AND the Featured video clip launches and plays successfully

title: Featured: Verify an unentitled user can play Featured Clip streams successfully (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND TheBlaze Channel is linked to a FREE (unentitled) TheBlaze account
AND has selected Featured Clips from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight a featured clip thumbnail
AND we select it
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not receive a paywall
AND the Featured video clip launches and plays successfully

title: Featured: Reaching the end of the content loops back to the beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected Featured Clips from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user traverses the rows' content
custom_expected:
THEN there will be no end
AND the content will loop back to the beginning
AND this occurs when going in both directions

title: Free: Verify a Free event is labeled as such
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND there is an available video feed that is marked as a Free Event
custom_steps: WHEN the user locates the thumbnail for this event
custom_expected:
THEN the event will display a Free Event indicator
AND TheBlaze Plus tag will not be present

title: Free: Verify an entitled user can play Free Event streams successfully (Blaze TV entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND there is an available video feed that is marked as a Free Event
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight the Free Event
AND attempt to play it
custom_expected: THEN the Free Event stream launches and plays successfully

title: Free: Verify an unentitled user can play Free Event streams successfully (not logged in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND there is an available video feed that is marked as a Free Event
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight the Free Event
AND attempt to play it
custom_expected: THEN the Free Event stream launches and plays successfully

title: Free: Verify an unentitled user can play Free Event streams successfully (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND TheBlaze Channel is linked to a Free (unentitled) TheBlaze account
AND there is an available video feed that is marked as a Free Event
custom_steps:
WHEN we highlight the Free Event
AND attempt to play it
custom_expected: THEN the Free Event stream launches and plays successfully

title: ***Free: Verify that once a free event ends, an unentitled user is kicked out of the playback (not logged in)
***Free: Verify that once a free event ends, an entitled user remains in the Linear Feed (Blaze TV entitlement)
Verify: Selecting All Shows from main menu opens page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are on the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we select All Shows from the menu options
custom_expected: THEN the All Shows page will open accordingly

title: Shows: Verify that we can traverse around the All Shows section without issue and that the thumbnails and formatting look correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we attempt to navigate around the All Shows section
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to navigate without issue
AND we are able to see all thumbnails correctly
AND we are able to see that everything appears to be formatted correctly

title: Shows: Verify user can scroll to view additional Show listings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Today's Lineup row
AND they navigate to the right
AND they navigate to the left
custom_expected:
THEN the show list will swipe accordingly
AND the additional thumbnails will display

title: Verify: Today's Lineup displays in top row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the top row
AND traverses the row content
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see
> Today's Lineup (individual shows by time)

title: Shows: Verify Show Title / Metadata displays for all thumbnails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user browses through the thumbnails
custom_expected:
THEN below each thumbnail will display the Title
AND the metadata will be formatted correctly

title: ***Shows: Confirm Categories and Show order is configurable
Shows: Verify top row displays the actual lineup for the day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the All Shows page loads
custom_expected:
THEN the top row will display Today's Lineup
AND this will properly reflect the day's schedule

title: Shows: Verify as the user navigates down in the All Shows view, that each show contains its own row followed by Categories
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the main menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user moves down on the All Shows page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see additional rows
AND each row will properly label the show episodes displayed
AND after the shows will display Category rows
> News & Opinions (Category)
> Entertainment (Category)
> Documentary (Category)
> Specials & Events (Category)

Category list as of April 2016:

Today's SHows
Glen Beck Radio Program
Glenn Beck Program
Pat and Stu
The Dana Show
Dana
The Buck Sexton Show
Tomi
Specials
Wonderful World of Stu
For the Record
The Root
News & Opinion 
Entertainment 
Trafficking Terrorism 
Cain Conversation
Week in Review
TacTV
The Right Stuff
Ammo & Attitude 
Hot Shots
3-Gun Nation
Honey Brake Experience
ThrowBeck 
Hutch
Pursuit of Truth
The B.S. of A.
Holiday Specials
Documentaries
Uncensored 
Restoring Love
Liberty Treehouse
Restoring Courage
Independence USA
Making of TheBlaze

title: Shows: Verify that each show row properly displays only episodes for that show
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a show's row
AND traverses the episode thumbnails in that row
custom_expected: THEN each thumbnail will correspond correctly to the show

title: ***Shows: Verify that if an archive is available and the show is selected, the user is brought to the Show Detail Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the main menu
AND there is an archive available for a Today's Lineup show listing
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the show from Today's Lineup with an archive
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Show Details Page

title: ***Shows: Verify that if an archive is not yet available and the show is selected, the user is redirected to the Show's general page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the main menu
AND a show from today has ended its LIVE broadcast
AND there is no archive available yet for the show
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the show from Today's Lineup (that's without an archive)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the Show's General page
AND the Featured (Paid) content will be at the top
AND the Free Featured Clips will display at the bottom

title: ***Shows: Verify when a show is selected from categories that it opens the show's page first, then redirect to the Episode Detail Page
***Shows: Verify when you select the thumbnail under a specific Show row under All Shows page, then redirect to the Episode Detail Page
Verify: Data refreshes every 5 minutes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has access TheBlaze
AND there is new data being posted
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the All Shows page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the data update according
AND this will update in intervals of 5 minutes
> New LIVE NOW option, etc

title: Shows: LIVE NOW tag displays for show in Today's Lineup that's currently Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND there is a show that's currently LIVE
custom_steps:
WHEN the user looks at the Today's Lineup row
AND locates the show that is LIVE
custom_expected: THEN the show's start time will be replaced with LIVE NOW

title: Shows: Reaching the end of the content loops back to the beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user traverses the rows' content
custom_expected:
THEN there will be no end
AND the content will loop back to the beginning
AND this occurs when going in both directions

title: Shows: Verify once thumbnail loads and the user scrolls away, it will not reload each time the row is visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN the user traverses the rows' content
AND the thumbnails for the Show rows' load
AND the user navigates away so the show row is no longer visible
AND navigates back to the show row
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will already be present
AND the images will not reload

title: ***Shows: Verify a Free event is labeled as such
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has navigated to the All Shows Page
AND there is an available video feed that is marked as a Free Event
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the Today's Lineup row
AND the user locates the thumbnail for this free event
custom_expected:
THEN the event will display a Free Event indicator
AND TheBlaze Plus tag will not be present

title: Verify: Navigating to a Category in the All Shows menu displays the correct results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to a Category row
custom_expected:
THEN a list of videos will display in the row
AND videos will matched the tagged category

title: Verify: Selecting a show from the Category section opens Show Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has navigated to a Category row
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a random show listing in a category row
custom_expected:
THEN the Show Page will open
AND the show's episodes will appear in the top row
AND the show's highlights will appear in the bottom row

title: Verify: Selecting Show from All Shows opens appropriate page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to the All Shows page
custom_steps: WHEN we are brought to a show page due to unavailable content
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding show page will open

title: Show Page: Verify the show's title displays in the upper right hand corner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we enter a show page
custom_expected: THEN the show's title will be listed in the upper right hand corner

AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:

custom_expected: THEN the media available corresponds to the Show

custom_steps: WHEN we attempt to navigate around the Show's page

AND we are able to see all thumbnails correctly

AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has selected a show
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the corresponding show page

THEN TheBlaze Plus episodes will display in the top Episodes section
AND the show highlights will display in the lower Highlights section

AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user looks at the Episodes section
AND the user looks at the Highlights section
custom_expected:

AND will display older episodes/highlights in descending order

custom_steps:

custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Highlights carousel row

title: Show Page: Verify the user cannot navigate beyond the Episodes listed

AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:

AND the user reaches the last listed Episode
AND the user attempts to navigate further

THEN the user will be unable to
AND the user will be able to navigate back to the left

REPEAT with the other direction

AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the right of the Highlights section
AND the user reaches the last listed Highlight
AND the user attempts to navigate further

THEN the user will be unable to
AND the user will be able to navigate back to the left

REPEAT with the other direction

custom_steps:

AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu

custom_steps:

title: Show Page: Verify when an unentitled user attempts to play an episode that a paywall is received (not logged in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user highlights an available episode
AND is brought to the episode description page
AND attempts to play the episode
custom_expected:
THEN the episode will not play
AND the user will receive a paywall message asking if the user is a TheBlaze TV subscriber

title: Show Page: Verify when an unentitled user attempts to play an episode that a paywall is received (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND TheBlaze Channel is linked to a Free (unentitled) TheBlaze account
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user highlights an available episode
AND is brought to the episode description page
AND attempts to play the episode
custom_expected:
THEN the episode will not play
AND the user will receive a paywall message asking if the user is a TheBlaze TV subscriber

title: Show Page: Verify an entitled user can play a video highlight successfully (Blaze TV entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an available video highlight
AND attempts to play the highlight
custom_expected: THEN the video highlight launches and plays successful

title: Show Page: Verify an unentitled user can play a video highlight successfully (not logged in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an available video highlight
AND attempts to play the highlight
custom_expected: THEN the video highlight launches and plays successfully

title: Show Page: Verify an unentitled user can play a video highlight successfully (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND TheBlaze Channel is linked to a Free (unentitled) TheBlaze account
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an available video highlight
AND attempts to play the highlight
custom_expected: THEN the video highlight launches and plays successfully

title: Show Page: Verify Episode listings only display up to 30 days worth of content
Show Page: Verify Highlight listings only display up to 30 days worth of content
Show Page: Verify that the Video Thumbnails correspond to the Video that they are for
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through the Episode thumbnails
AND the user navigates through the Highlight thumbnails
custom_expected: THEN the various Video Thumbnails correspond to the correct Videos that they are for

title: Show Page: Verify Show Title / Metadata display for all thumbnails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user browses through the thumbnails
custom_expected:
THEN below each thumbnail will display the Title
AND the metadata will be formatted correctly

title: Show Page: Reaching the end of the content loops back to the beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user traverses the rows
custom_expected:
THEN there will be no end
AND the content will loop back to the beginning
AND this occurs when going in both directions

title: Show Page: Verify that once a feed ends, the user is returned to the show page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Roku device is connected using a wired network connection
AND we have accessed TheBlaze
AND the user linked TheBlaze Channel with a BlazeTV account
AND have successfully launched a video feed
custom_steps: WHEN the stream ends
custom_expected: THEN the user is returned to the page the video was launched from

title: Episode: Verify description page for unavailable media displays correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
AND the episode for that day is not available to stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the episode
AND is brought to the episode description page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a message at the top that states "Show not yet available"
AND this will be in place of the "Watch now" option
AND below this will have an option for "Watch previous episodes"
AND at the bottom will display the episode description

title: Episode: Verify description page for available media displays correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page
AND the episode stream is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the episode
AND is brought to the episode description page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a message at the top that states "Watch now"
AND at the bottom will display the episode description

title: Episode: User presses the Play button on the Episode page (Archive Available)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has selected a thumbnail from Today's Lineup for a show that has already aired
AND the episode's archive is available
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Play button the their Roku remote
custom_expected:
THEN the episode will begin to Play
AND it will always start at the beginning of archive stream

title: Episode: User presses the Play button on the Episode page (no media available)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page from Today's Lineup
AND the episode for that day is not available to stream yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Play button the their Roku remote
custom_expected:
THEN the user will remain on the episode page
AND no media will play
AND a 'click' sound effect will register that the Play button was attempted

title: Episode: User presses the Play button on the Episode page (Live stream Available)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page from Today's Lineup
AND the episode for that day is currently streaming LIVE
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Play button the their Roku remote
custom_expected:
THEN the LIVE stream will begin to play
AND it will start at the current live streaming location

title: Episode: Verify the remote control navigation arrows cycle through the row content as expected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page from Today's Lineup
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the Left Arrow on their remote
OR the user presses the Right Arrow on their remote
custom_expected:
THEN the Episode page will flip to the corresponding show in the lineup
AND the user will be able to navigate both directions

title: ***Episode: Pressing the Up navigation arrow from the top of the episode menu brings the user Back
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected All Shows from the Main Menu
AND has entered a Show Page from Today's Lineup
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is at the top of the Episode Page options
AND presses the Up navigation arrow on their Roku remote control
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought Back to the All Shows page

title: ***Verify: Selecting Search from main menu opens page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are on the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we select Search from the menu options
custom_expected: THEN the Search page will open accordingly

title: ***Search: Verify that we can traverse around Search Results without issue and that the thumbnails and formatting looks correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected Search from the Main Menu
AND has entered and executed a search
custom_steps: WHEN we attempt to navigate around the Search Results
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to navigate without issue
AND we are able to see all thumbnails correctly
AND we are able to see that everything appears to be formatted correctly

title: ***Search: Verify Paid and Free content results are displayed in different rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have selected Search
custom_steps: WHEN we perform a search
custom_expected:
THEN the results will be broken up into two different rows of data
AND one row will be for Paid content (Episodes)
AND the other row will be for Free content (Highlights)

title: ***Search: Verify search results are limited to the last 30 days worth of content (program shelf life)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we go to the Search section
custom_steps: WHEN we perform a search
custom_expected: THEN the results will be limited to media content from the last 30 days

title: ***Search: Verify when utilizing the Search function we are able to search and return results successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are on the Main Menu
AND we have selected the Menu Item
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter in a search criteria
AND we attempt to run the search
custom_expected:
THEN the results returned are correct 
AND the results are accurate

title: ***Search: Verify selecting search result opens corresponding Episode page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND selected Search from the Main Menu
AND has performed a search
custom_steps:
WHEN the user browses the search results
AND selects an Episode listed
custom_expected:
THEN the corresponding Episode description page will open
AND the user will be able launch the media successfully

title: ***Search: Verify selecting search result opens corresponding Highlight
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND selected Search from the Main Menu
AND has performed a search
custom_steps:
WHEN the user browses the search results
AND selects an Episode listed
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding Video Highlight will launch and play successfully

title: ***Search: Reaching the end of the content loops back to the beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND has selected Search from the Main Menu
AND has entered and executed a search
custom_steps: WHEN the user traverses the rows
custom_expected:
THEN there will be no end
AND the content will loop back to the beginning
AND this occurs when going in both directions

title: Verify: Selecting TheBlaze Radio from main menu opens page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we are on the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we select TheBlaze Radio from the menu options
custom_expected: THEN TheBlaze Radio page will open accordingly

title: Radio: TheBlaze Radio Network page display
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
custom_steps:
WHEN we access TheBlaze Radio from the menu
AND we are brought to the radio page
custom_expected:
THEN page header will read 'TheBlaze Radio Network'
AND TheBlazeTV logo will appear in the top left corner
AND the current available media will appear on the top
AND a thumbnail will appear to the left of the LIVE media
AND the schedule will appear on the bottom

title: Radio: Verify pressing Play to a LIVE broadcast streams audio accordingly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio
AND there is a LIVE broadcast available
custom_steps: WHEN we choose the option to Play
custom_expected: THEN the Audio Stream will begin to play

title: Radio: Verify pressing Stop to a LIVE broadcast stops audio accordingly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio
AND there is a LIVE broadcast available
AND we are currently playing the audio stream
custom_steps: WHEN we press the Stop option
custom_expected: THEN the Audio stream stops playing accordingly

title: Radio: Verify Audio Player toggles between Play and Stop (does not show Pause)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Audio section
AND there is a LIVE Broadcast
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to play the Audio stream
AND we attempt to stop the Audio stream
custom_expected:
THEN the status will properly reflect the Play status
AND the status will properly reflect the Stopped status

title: Radio: Verify playing Stopped audio will restart at the current LIVE point of broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlazeRadio
AND there is a Radio Show currently LIVE
custom_steps:
WHEN we play the radio show
AND we stop it
AND we press play after a certain amount of time
custom_expected:
THEN the radio show will continue at the LIVE point of the Broadcast
AND it will not pick up from where it was stopped from

title: Radio: Verify the Title/HeaderText above the play/stop button will update dynamically based on current live program airing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio section
AND there is a LIVE broadcast in progress
custom_steps: WHEN we view the title above the Play/Stop option
custom_expected:
THEN the title will match the LIVE broadcast
AND the title will update as the broadcast changes

title: Radio: Verify an entitled user can play TheBlaze Radio streams successfully (Blaze TV entitlement)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected TheBlaze Radio from the main menu
custom_steps:
WHEN their is a live Radio broadcast available
AND the user attempts to Play the audio stream
custom_expected: THEN the Audio stream launches and plays successfully

title: Radio: Verify an unentitled user can play TheBlaze Radio streams successfully (not logged in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND has selected TheBlaze Radio from the main menu
custom_steps:
WHEN their is a live Radio broadcast available
AND the user attempts to Play the audio stream
custom_expected: THEN the Audio stream launches and plays successfully

title: Radio: Verify an unentitled user can play TheBlaze Radio streams successfully (Free Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has NOT linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND TheBlaze Channel is linked to a Free (unentitled) TheBlaze account
AND has selected TheBlaze Radio from the main menu
custom_steps:
WHEN their is a live Radio broadcast available
AND the user attempts to Play the audio stream
custom_expected: THEN the Audio stream launches and plays successfully

title: Radio: Verify Audio playback does not continue during navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio
AND we have started playing a LIVE broadcast
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate away from the Radio page
custom_expected: THEN Audio playback will not continue when TheBlaze Radio page is exited

title: Radio: Verify when a user attempts to play audio when connected wirelessly that it plays successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Roku device is connected using a wireless network connection
AND we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio
AND there is a LIVE broadcast available
custom_steps: WHEN we choose the option to Play
custom_expected: THEN the Audio Stream will begin to play

title: Radio: Verify when a user attempts to play audio when connected with a wired network that it plays successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Roku device is connected using a wired network connection
AND we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio
AND there is a LIVE broadcast available
custom_steps: WHEN we choose the option to Play
custom_expected: THEN the Audio Stream will begin to play

title: Schedule: Verify that the current and next 3 airing shows display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND there are Live Radio Broadcasts scheduled for today
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the TheBlaze Radio section
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the currently playing radio broadcast listed
AND we will see the next 3 scheduled radio show broadcasts
AND these will display under the top live broadcast section

title: Schedule: Verify that after a program has aired, the schedule removes this and adds a later upcoming show to the end of the list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to TheBlaze Radio section
AND there are at least 5 radio broadcasts scheduled for today
AND there is a live broadcast currently airing
custom_steps:
WHEN the live broadcast ends
AND a new broadcast begins
custom_expected:
THEN the schedule section on the bottom will shift up
AND the top listing will be removed
AND a new/later scheduled item will display at the bottom of the scheduled list

title: Schedule: Verify LIVE show displays "LIVE NOW" infront of show title instead of the time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND there are Live Radio Broadcasts scheduled for today (at least 4)
AND a Radio broadcast is currently streaming LIVE
custom_steps:
WHEN we access TheBlaze Radio section
AND look at the schedule
custom_expected:
THEN the LIVE broadcast will show the words LIVE NOW before the program title
AND the start time will not be present
AND the unaired programs will display the start time instead before their respective titles

title: Schedule: Verify that the schedule loops during off hours
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND there are no more LIVE Radio broadcasts scheduled
custom_steps:
WHEN we access TheBlaze Radio section
AND look at the schedule
custom_expected:
THEN the Radio Schedule will display the earlier scheduled content
AND there will always be scheduled items displaying

title: ***Verify: Choosing Logout options successfully logs the user out of their account (delinks)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlaze
AND the user has linked TheBlaze Channel with an entitled TheBlaze TV account
AND goes to the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Log Out
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be successfully logged out of their TheBlaze TV account
AND they will be unable to access any TheBlaze Plus content that they could previously access

title: Account Verification: Verify that if the user has no entitlements for their Account that their Account functions correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to Settings from the Main Menu
AND we have chosen to "Log into your TheBlaze TV account"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is provided with a 5 digit activation code
AND the user navigates to http://www.video.theblaze.com/roku/
AND selects 'ALREADY A THEBLAZE TV SUBSCRIBER? CLICK HERE TO ACTIVATE YOUR ROKU ACCOUNT!'
AND we login using the following credentials: gbtvtest1@mlb.com / tester
AND we enter the activation code



URL: http://web.gbtv.com/about/compare.jsp
custom_expected:
THEN the Roku TheBlaze screen will automatically update to a successful linking screen
AND we are able to access various Highlights inside of the application
AND we are able to access any Video that doesn't have a TheBlaze Plus tag in the top right corner of it
AND we are able to utilize the Audio UI to play Audio Streams

title: Account Verification: Verify that the entitlements for a Monthly Plus Account work correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to Settings from the Main Menu
AND we have chosen to "Log into your TheBlaze TV account"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is provided with a 5 digit activation code
AND the user navigates to http://www.video.theblaze.com/roku/
AND selects 'ALREADY A THEBLAZE TV SUBSCRIBER? CLICK HERE TO ACTIVATE YOUR ROKU ACCOUNT!'
AND we login using the following credentials: gbtvtest5@mlb.com / tester
AND we enter the activation code

URL: http://www.video.theblaze.com/about/index.jsp
custom_expected:
THEN the Roku TheBlaze screen will automatically update to a successful linking screen
AND we are able to access various Highlights inside of the application
AND we are able to access any Paid video content that has a TheBlaze Plus tag in the top right corner of it
AND we are able to utilize the Audio UI to play Audio Streams

title: Account Verification: Verify that the entitlements for a Annual Plus Account work correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to Settings from the Main Menu
AND we have chosen to "Log into your TheBlaze TV account"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is provided with a 5 digit activation code
AND the user navigates to http://www.video.theblaze.com/roku/
AND selects 'ALREADY A THEBLAZE TV SUBSCRIBER? CLICK HERE TO ACTIVATE YOUR ROKU ACCOUNT!'
AND we login using the following credentials: gbtvtest5@mlb.com / tester
AND we enter the activation code

URL: http://www.video.theblaze.com/about/index.jsp
custom_expected:
THEN the Roku TheBlaze screen will automatically update to a successful linking screen
AND we are able to access various Highlights inside of the application
AND we are able to access any Paid video content that has a TheBlaze Plus tag in the top right corner of it
AND we are able to utilize the Audio UI to play Audio Streams

title: Account Verification: Verify that if a user hasn't linked the Channel to a TheBlaze TV entitled account that they will be unable to view any of the GBTV content that requires a login
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
custom_steps: WHEN we do not link TheBlaze to any TheBlaze TV account
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to access various Highlights inside of the application
AND we are unable to access any Paid TheBlaze Plus TV content
AND we are able to utilize the Audio UI to play Audio Streams

title: ***Account Verification: Verify that if we have changed an accounts password and we then attempt to access content that we will be unsuccessful
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we already have credentials stored on the device
AND we change the credentials password on a different device
AND we don't change the credentials password on the device as of yet
custom_steps: WHEN we attempt to access TheBlaze Plus content that we were previously able to access
custom_expected: THEN we will be unsuccessful

title: ***Account Verification: Verify that if the user links a Free account with no entitlements that their Account functions correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed TheBlaze
AND we have navigated to Settings from the Main Menu
AND we have chosen to "Log into your TheBlaze TV account"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is provided with a 5 digit activation code
AND the user navigates to http://www.video.theblaze.com/roku/
AND selects 'ALREADY A THEBLAZE TV SUBSCRIBER? CLICK HERE TO ACTIVATE YOUR ROKU ACCOUNT!'
AND we login using a free account (created from registering on the Free iOS app, for example)
AND we enter the activation code
custom_expected:
THEN the Roku TheBlaze screen will automatically update to a successful linking screen
AND we are able to access various Highlights inside of the application
AND we are able to access any Video that doesn't have a TheBlaze Plus tag in the top right corner of it
AND we are able to utilize the Audio UI to play Audio Streams

title: ***Scenario: User buys the application using IAP and then links it to web subscriber account that has no previous entitlements
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the Settings option from the Main Menu
AND selects "Link your purchase to watch on other devices"
AND follows the flow
custom_expected:
THEN the web account should be linked
AND we can verify that the account was linked in the Customer Service Tool
AND when we login to a second device with the linked account the proper content will be unlocked

title: ***Scenario: User logs into the application using a web subscriber account that has no previous entitlements and purchases IAP, user then manually links account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed TheBlze
AND goes to Settings
AND selects "Log into your TheBlazeTV account"
AND logs in with a TheBlaze web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the user buys the application through in-app purchase
AND goes to Settings
AND selects "Link your purchase to watch on other devices"
AND manually links their TheBlaze web account
custom_expected:
THEN the web account should be linked
AND we can verify that the account was linked in the Customer Service Tool
AND when we login to a second device with the linked account the proper content will be unlocked

title: ***Scenario: User tries to link multiple accounts to an In-App Purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user accesses TheBlaze
AND buys the application through in-app purchase
AND goes to Settings
AND selects "Link your purchase to watch on other devices"
AND the user links it to a TheBlaze web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs out of their TheBlaze web account
AND logs in with a different TheBlaze web account
AND manually links the second web account
custom_expected:
THEN the first web account should lose entitlement
AND the second linked web account should be entitled with the correct features
